skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 5%. 

Has a 30% chance to repeat this skill. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff on the target for 2 turns if this skill is repeated.
skills.name: Gleeful Ripping
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on a target enemy for 1 turn.
skills.name: Skull Claim
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Abyssal Clutch
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
When attacked, decreases the attacker's MAX HP by 5%. Cannot decrease a single enemy's MAX HP by more than 50%. Occurs once per enemy attack. Does not work against bosses.

Has a 50% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff on targets whose MAX HP has been decreased by 20% or more.
skills.name: Horrific Foe [P]

skills.desc:
Revives Skullsworn with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter at the start of each turn.

[If there are multiple Skullsworns on the team, only one of them will be revived.]
skills.name: Skull Brood [P]
